mapper.select:
select * from (select * from (select c.CUSTOMNO, c.name, c.birth, c.email, c.addr1, c.addr2, c.tel, c.gender, c.registdate, c.code from customInfo c
where ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%'
order by c.CUSTOMNO desc) where rownum<=${linePerPage}*${nowPage} order by CUSTOMNO asc)
where rownum<=${linePerPage} order by CUSTOMNO desc
where rownum<=${lastPageLine} order by CUSTOMNO desc
select customNo, RSph, RCyl, RAxis, RAdd, LSph, LCyl, LAxis, LAdd, pd, registDate from OptometryRegistry where customNo = ${no} order by registdate desc
select * from customInfo where name = #{name} and tel = #{tel} and code = ${code}
select customNo, name, to_char(birth,'YYYY-MM-DD') birth, email, addr1, addr2, gender, code, tel from customInfo where customNo=${customNo}
mapper.insert:
insert into CustomInfo(customNo, name, birth, gender, tel, email, addr1, addr2, code) values(custom_sq.nextval, #{name}, #{birth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ${code})
select custom_sq.currval from dual

insert into OptometryRegistry(Optometryno, customNo, Rsph, rcyl, raxis, lsph, lcyl, laxis, pd, radd, ladd, memo, sellno) values( opt_sq.nextval, ${customNo}, ${RSph}, ${RCyl}, ${RAxis}, ${LSph}, ${LCyl}, ${LAxis}, ${pd}, ${RAdd}, ${LAdd}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ${sellNo})
select to_Char(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') registDate from dual
mapper.select: select distinct customNo, s.sellNo, s.empno, s.sellstatus, to_char(selldate,'YYYY-MM-DD') selldate, e.ename, optResult from sellInfo s join empInfo e on e.empno=s.empno where s.code=${code} and to_char(s.sellDate,'YYYY-MM-DD')=#{date} order by s.sellNo
select s.sellNo, s.goodNo, s.qtt, s.realPrice, g.model from sellInfo s join goodinfo g on s.goodNo=g.goodNo where s.code=${code} and to_char(s.sellDate,'YYYY-MM-DD')=#{date} order by s.sellNo
mapper.update: update sellInfo set customNo=${customNo}, promiseDate=#{promiseDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sellStatus=#{sellStatus}, optResult=1 where sellNo=${sellNo}
mapper.select: select campname, sum, sellNo, round(sum/sellNo,-2) avg from ( select code,sum(qtt*realprice) sum, count(sellNo) sellNo from sellInfo where to_char(selldate,'YYYY-MM-DD')=#{date} group by code) s join campInfo c on c.code=s.code order by c.code

select campname, sum, sellNo, round(sum/sellNo,-2) avg from (select code,sum(qtt*realprice) sum, count(sellNo) sellNo from sellInfo where selldate BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate} group by code) s join campInfo c on c.code=s.code order by c.code
